title: HEDVIG'S HERESY (ART + SPEEDPAINT)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:hedvig-s-heresy-art/IMG_0422%20%281%29.png]]

> A little thing I drew as part of an [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-16702779/art-requests Art Request thread] I'm doing! <3 
> Thank you to  [[*user Miss Lapis]], who requested this. She pointed me to the tale [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/heresy Hedvig's Heresy], which I used as the inspiration for this. Thank you for that! It was a great read, with some gorgeous imagery! <3 
> The music for the speedpaint is Zombie by the Cranberries - I'm making a Hedvig playlist, since there's a lot of good songs I think fit her. PM me if you want links :eyes: 
> And as always - if you like this, my author page is [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Here]
